name: One Way Out (Conrad Vos)
description:
Find your way out of the cave. The light at the end of the tunnel is the goal.

Move using the arrow keys. Light up the dark with your flare gun to see the path, but beware, you only have 3 flares. Use the flare gun by clicking it or pressing "F" on your keyboard. The "light shows" you the way.

Do not walk off the cliffs, you will fall and die, leading to a game over and needing to restart. You restart from level 1 each time. You only have one chance. There is only one way out.
